content.title: Add Mapping Action
content.body:
1. From the Action Editor canvas, under Invoke Service, select Callback.
  2. From the left menu of the Action Editor, under Mapping, select Add Mapping.
    The Mapping Editor window appears.
  3. From the left pane of the Mapping Editor, expand Services > Service-AccountStorage$Accounts$get and select records{collection}.
  4. From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, expand Forms > frmAccount > Segment-segAccount > masterdatamap and select rowData{collection}.
